about_the_game:
Control the cute and speedy Lumi to reach the producer, Lord Leo, and escape his diabolical game show!

  • Easy to play, difficult to master

    Simple controls with movement that's fast, fluid and precise yet deep.

  • 60 unique levels spread across 6 themed worlds

    Explore levels for tokens to unlock new paths on the map screen allowing for different ways to reach the end and beat Lord Leo.

  • Awesomely bouncy electronic beats

    Tonnes of melodic electronic music tracks driving the action with beat-matched visuals.

  • Replays and Ghosts

    Nuances to the movement in a game designed to not limit your mastery brings with it ways to always improve your times! See how you rank on the leaderboards or share your best replays with the world!

  • Level/world editors

    Create and share your own devilish levels and worlds via the Steam Workshop with fully integrated editors.

  • Desert Dimensions extra campaign now available

    Over 20 extra levels filled with new mechanics and challenges calling you to explore the desert to find the tomb and conquer the Pyramid of Geezer.

movies.name: Super Lumi Live - Just Another Trailer

name: Super Lumi Live

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (2.4GHz+) or AMD Athlon X2 (2.3GHz+)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB SM 3.0 (GeForce GTX 300+, Radeon HD 4000+ or Intel 4500+)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 compatible card
  • Additional Notes: Controller strongly recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad (3.0GHz+) or AMD Athlon X4 (2.4GHz+)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB SM 3.0 (GeForce GTX 600+, Radeon R9 200+ or Intel HD 4000+)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 compatible card
  • Additional Notes: Controller strongly recommended

reviews:
“Super Lumi Live sticks it to the die-hards of modern platformers and leaves an addicting, lip-biting good time in the depths of a super-sleek neon world”
NITCHIGAMER

“This is the kind of game that speedrunners would fall in love with.”
Highsight
short_description: 2D platforming distilled down to it's purest form. Fast, tight and silky smooth movement combined with multi-layered levels that are filled to the brim with different challenges. Find secrets, collect tokens, discover hidden levels and perfect your routes in this thrilling neon platformer.
